event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected CPU, the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The number of integer register errors associated with this thread has exceeded acceptable levels.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The Message ID:   %MSGID% indicates a diagnosis has determined that one of the threads in the multi-thread processor is faulty. The fault manager arranged an automated attempt to disable this thread. The diagnosis determined the fault is localized to a single thread that is being removed from service. However, it is recommended that the system administrator contact Sun support and arrange for the replacement of the affected component. Use the command fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>  with the  <EVENT_ID>  from the console message to locate the faulty component.

The physical thread number reported by the fault manager may not be the same as the logical thread number reported by Solaris. In the example below, the physical thread number is 8 while the logical thread number is 4. 

# fmdump -v -u fd940ac2-d21e-c94a-f258-f8a9bb69d05b
TIME                 UUID                                 SUNW-MSG-ID
Jul 31 12:47:42.2007 fd940ac2-d21e-c94a-f258-f8a9bb69d05b SUN4V-8000-GE
 100%  fault.cpu.ultraSPARC-T2.ireg

       Problem in: cpu:///cpuid=8/serial=5D67334847
          Affects: cpu:///cpuid=8/serial=5D67334847
              FRU: hc://:serial=101083:part=541215101/motherboard=0
         Location: MB 

#psrinfo
0	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:02
1	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
2	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
3	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
4	faulted   since 07/31/2007 12:47:42
5	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
6	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
7	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
8	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
9	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
10	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
11	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
12	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
13	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
14	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03
15	on-line   since 07/09/2007 20:06:03

Note the FRU called out includes a part number and a Location field: 

part=541215101

Location: MB

This part number is the FRU part number. The Location field calls out the MB (motherboard) as the FRU to be replaced.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response
event_registry_properties.item: The fault manager will attempt to remove the affected thread from service.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: Single thread integer register errors exceeded acceptable levels
